verbs.description: ashtabula [ARG1: man] [V: shot] [ARG0: by police] [ARGM-TMP: in 2017] files civil rights lawsuit against city officers the lawsuit claims that the officers violated hester 4th amendment rights through the use of force they are also citing the city of ashtabula for their failure to train and supervise its officers ashtabula police department brendan hester ashtabula ohio police rights
